snippet.title: Lovecraft’s Untold Stories 2 - Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Lovecraft’s Untold Stories 2 is the continuation of the action RPG with rogue-like elements based on the HP Lovecraft Mythos. Coming out in Early Access October 2021!

Brand new dark comic graphic style, an advanced crafting system to create your equipment, 6 playable characters, and, for the first time, an online cooperative mode.

Wishlist now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1401400/Lovecrafts_Untold_Stories_2/

Follow us:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/publisher/1CEntertainment
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/1c-entertainment
Website: http://www.1cpublishing.eu/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/1CCompany/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/1C_Company
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/1c_entertainment/

#RPG #Lovecraft
